QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when tags = '{}' or tags is null then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when tags = '{}' or tags is null then title || ' has no tags.'
    else title || ' has tags.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_redshift_cluster;
